nodes.text: Keith Ryan Kappel is a former United States Navy Space Command intelligence specialist, a freelance writer for the Fantasy Flight Games' line of Star Wars roleplaying games, as well as the founder, editor, and writer of FandomComics.com. He also was a play tester for the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game line. While acting as the editor and writer of FandomComics.com between 2005-2012, Kappel made Star Wars fancomics and RPG material.
